resources.string: Useful tweaks and fixes for MIUI7/8

Thanks for all 4pda users and developers, who made this patches. You can find them here

vgogafa - for new app icon

rovo89 - for the greatest Xposed framework

MIUI.su command - for russian language in T9 patch

SolarWarez - patched Xposed for MIUI and huge help with interface and other code stuff

Theos2009 - for Ukrainian localization

Thanks to all testers and people, who supports me.
Module isn\'t activated! You should activate it in Xposed Installer app.
Add separated notification volume control in settings and unlink it from ringer volume control. Adds a notification volume slider in sound settings. Only for MIUI7.
Add 3 way reboot (normal, recovery, fastboot) menu
Fix automatic brightness steps (more smooth) and minimal brightness level on some devices. You can customize brightness and backlight levels gradation.
Add shortcut for launch dialer to lockscreen. You can customize dialer package name and starting activity.
Error processing numbers. Check to see if the letters or other characters entered.
Disable trimming contacts with long names and display its on multiple lines.
Add support for russian language in dialer T9 contacts search. After enable/disable you should rebuild T9 index in Contacts app settings.
Google Play Services is not available.
Thanks for donation! It\'s make me happy :)
Oops… Something went wrong. Here is error code: %d
Replace alphabet in contacts app sidebar with russian. Press on letter or swipe down for quick navigation through russian contacts.
Enable or disable transparent bluring of background behind notification panel (only for MIUI7).
Fix launching music player from the notification bar (from the recent apps for MIUI8). You can access any running player, not only MIUI music.
Donate with QIWI to max.karelov@gmail.com. Click on button will copy email to clipboard and open site in browser.
The reaction time for changing light conditions in miliseconds (1s == 1000ms)
Go to home screen after outgoing call
Enable or disable search bar in notification panel
If you like the app, please make a donation.\nIf you for some reason can\'t (or don\'t want) - click on the ads.
Add customize button to theme app (it disappears on some firmware versions after connection to internet)
For Multirom users. Fix opening video and music only in stock apps (eg, using external player in Kate Mobile).
Add your own animation speed multiplier to development settings.
Disable unnecessary toggles from notification panel. Also you can reduce size of each toggle.
Fix free RAM size on Multirom firmwares

+ New material design

+ Added ability to apply some tweaks without reboot

+ Added free RAM fix

+ Added ability to change toggle columns count

* Fixed multiline contacts name on MIUI8

* Fixed tweak "Go home after call end"

* Fixed "Brightness fix" tweak

* Fixed "Media player" tweak for Multirom users
You running non-MIUI ROM. Application will be closed.
Show all selected toggles in combined notification panel
For changing theme application will be restarted
